chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
K: Type
K_eq_dec: forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y}

Goal:
forall (k k' : K) (l : list op), acknowledged_op k l -> acknowledged_op k (I k' :: l)

Premises:
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
acknowledged_op = fun (k : K) (trace : list op) => In (O k) trace : K -> list op -> Prop Arguments acknowledged_op _ _%list_scope
Inductive op : Type := I : K -> op | O : K -> op
acknowledged_op_I_cons_reduce : forall (k k' : K) (l : list op), acknowledged_op k (I k' :: l) -> acknowledged_op k l
acknowledged_op_dec : forall (k : K) (tr : list op), {acknowledged_op k tr} + {~ acknowledged_op k tr}
acknowledged_op_defn : forall (k : K) (xs : list op), acknowledged_op k xs -> In (O k) xs
AAO_IO : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: out)
get_set_diff : forall (K V : Type) (K_eq_dec : forall k k' : K, {k = k'} + {k <> k'}) (k k' : K) (v : V) (l : list (K * V)), k <> k' -> assoc K_eq_dec (assoc_set K_eq_dec l k v) k' = assoc K_eq_dec l k'
AAO_IU : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: IRU k :: out)
AAO_I_dorp : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (I k :: tr) out
get_set_same' : forall (K V : Type) (K_eq_dec : forall k k' : K, {k = k'} + {k <> k'}) (k k' : K) (v : V) (l : list (K * V)), k = k' -> assoc K_eq_dec (assoc_set K_eq_dec l k v) k' = Some v
acknowledge_all_ops_ind : forall P : list op -> list IR -> Prop, P [] [] -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: IRU k :: out)) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) out) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: out)) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (O k :: tr) (IRO k :: out)) ->...-> P l l0
acknowledge_all_ops_sind : forall P : list op -> list IR -> SProp, P [] [] -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: IRU k :: out)) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) out) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: out)) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (O k :: tr) (IRO k :: out)) ->...-> P l l0
get_set_diff_default : forall (K V : Type) (K_eq_dec : forall k k' : K, {k = k'} + {k <> k'}) (k k' : K) (v : V) (l : list (K * V)) (d : V), k <> k' -> assoc_default K_eq_dec (assoc_set K_eq_dec l k v) k' d = assoc_default K_eq_dec l k' d
assoc_default_assoc_set_diff : forall (K V : Type) (K_eq_dec : forall k k' : K, {k = k'} + {k <> k'}) (l : list (K * V)) (k : K) (v : V) (k' : K) (d : V), k <> k' -> assoc_default K_eq_dec (assoc_set K_eq_dec l k' v) k d = assoc_default K_eq_dec l k d
Inductive acknowledge_all_ops : list op -> list IR -> Prop := AAO_nil : acknowledge_all_ops [] [] | AAO_IU : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: IRU k :: out) | AAO_I_dorp : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (I k :: tr) out | AAO_IO : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledged_op k tr ->...-> acknowledge_all_ops (O k :: tr) (IRO k :: out) Arguments acknowledge_all_ops (_ _)%list_scope Arguments AAO_IU _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments AAO_I_dorp _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments AAO_IO _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments AAO_O _ (_ _)%list_scope
not_in_assoc : forall (K V : Type) (K_eq_dec : forall k k' : K, {k = k'} + {k <> k'}) (k : K) (l : list (K * V)), ~ In k (map fst l) -> assoc K_eq_dec l k = None
assoc_set_same : forall (K V : Type) (K_eq_dec : forall k k' : K, {k = k'} + {k <> k'}) (l : list (K * V)) (k : K) (v : V), assoc K_eq_dec l k = Some v -> assoc_set K_eq_dec l k v = l
op_equiv_ack_op_rl : forall xs ys : list op, op_equivalent xs ys -> forall k : K, acknowledged_op k ys -> acknowledged_op k xs
op_equiv_ack_op_lr : forall xs ys : list op, op_equivalent xs ys -> forall k : K, acknowledged_op k xs -> acknowledged_op k ys
get_set_same : forall (K V : Type) (K_eq_dec : forall k k' : K, {k = k'} + {k <> k'}) (k : K) (v : V) (l : list (K * V)), assoc K_eq_dec (assoc_set K_eq_dec l k v) k = Some v
assoc_default_a_equiv : forall (K V : Type) (K_eq_dec : forall k k' : K, {k = k'} + {k <> k'}) (l l' : list (K * V)) (k : K) (v : V), a_equiv K_eq_dec l l' -> assoc_default K_eq_dec l k v = assoc_default K_eq_dec l' k v
assoc_default_assoc_set : forall (K V : Type) (K_eq_dec : forall k k' : K, {k = k'} + {k <> k'}) (l : list (K * V)) (k : K) (v d : V), assoc_default K_eq_dec (assoc_set K_eq_dec l k v) k d = v
get_set_same_default : forall (K V : Type) (K_eq_dec : forall k k' : K, {k = k'} + {k <> k'}) (k : K) (v : V) (l : list (K * V)) (d : V), assoc_default K_eq_dec (assoc_set K_eq_dec l k v) k d = v
before_head_op : forall (l : list op) (h : K) (ir : list IR), (forall k1 k2 : K, In (I k2) l -> before (O k1) (I k2) l -> before (IRO k1) (IRI k2) (IRI h :: ir)) -> forall x : op, In (I h) l -> before x (I h) l -> exists k : K, x = I k
assoc_a_equiv : forall (K V : Type) (K_eq_dec : forall k k' : K, {k = k'} + {k <> k'}) (l l' : list (K * V)) (k : K), a_equiv K_eq_dec l l' -> assoc K_eq_dec l k = assoc K_eq_dec l' k
a_equiv : (forall k k' : ?K, {k = k'} + {k <> k'}) -> list (?K * ?V) -> list (?K * ?V) -> Prop where ?K : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type] ?V : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type]
good_op_move_cases : forall x y : op, good_op_move x y -> exists k k' : K, x = I k /\ y = I k' \/ x = O k /\ y = O k' \/ k <> k' /\ x = I k /\ y = O k'

```coq
intros k k' l H.
destruct (acknowledged_op_dec k l) as [H_ack | H_not_ack].
- apply acknowledged_op_defn in H_ack.
  constructor.
  simpl.
  auto.
- apply AAO_I_dorp with (k := k) (tr := l) (out := []).
  auto.
  constructor.
Qed.

original: intros k k' l H. destruct (acknowledged_op_dec k l) as [H_ack | H_not_ack]. - apply acknowledged_op_defn in H_ack. constructor. simpl. auto. - apply AAO_I_dorp with (k := k) (tr := l) (out := []). auto. constructor.
